name: True Friendship Poems & Cards: Pictures For Status
description: Does reading Friendship Quotes melt your heart? Does thinking about your friends bring back the fondest of memories? Then why wait for tomorrow to send your friends sweet friendship messages? Send a cute poem along with a beautiful card to your friends to express your gratitude and love.   Get HUNDREDS of free friendship messages including Happy Birthday verses too! Share these amazing friendship quotes online  with a beautiful image and tag your best friends.  Download our True Friendship Poems app today and pick your favorite best friend quotes with backgrounds of lovely flowers , nature  and beautiful places .  FEATURES OF FRIENDSHIP POEMS AND CARDS:  Send free friendship cards and meaningful friendship poems  Share text or image format of poems and quotes  Send via text, SMS or other chat apps  No need to search online for content. You get everything in ONE app!  Save your favorite quote and view or share later!  Start sending cute friendship poems and friendship cards to your friends and express gratitude! Send free poems and friendship cards to your crush to begin your love story!
